word_mean: 胃的受纳功能障碍，食欲下降，进食减少的病理变化。
不思饮食，食量减少的表现。
对饮食有厌恶感，不愿进食的表现。
以长期厌恶饮食，消瘦疲乏为主要表现的疾病。

sentence.Network_en: The causes of anorexia are much debated.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于厌食的起因存在颇多争论。

sentence.Network_en: Anorexia can creep up on young girls when they least expect it.
sentence.Network_cn: 年轻女子可能在最没有防备的情況下患上厌食症.

sentence.Network_en: Reports of anorexia and other eating disorders are on the increase.
sentence.Network_cn: 据报告,厌食症和其他饮食方面的功能紊乱发生率正在不断增长.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 厌食症(anorexia)是指较长期的食欲减退或消失、食量减少为主要症状,是现今小儿中常见的病症。严重者可造成营养不良及多种维生素 …
厌食(Anorexia)是指较长时期食欲减退或消失。厌食症，或称神经性厌食症；(Anorexia Nervosa, AN)，是一种进食障碍类的精神疾病。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via late Latin from Greek, from an- 'without' + orexis 'appetite'

entry.def: Anorexia or anorexia nervosa is an illness in which a person has an overwhelming fear of becoming fat, and so refuses to eat enough and becomes thinner and thinner.

means.word_mean: 1. a prolonged disorder of eating due to loss of appetite
